attributes.action: Discuss how to tackle the neo nazis golden dawn in greece and jobbik in hungary.
attributes.additional_details:
Recently the sun revealed the election of a neo nazi in the eu elections: one in greece, one in hungary and one in greece. We must at least begin to talk about it and do whatever we can to prevent the spread of them, particularly golden dawn in greece who are said to have infiltrated the police, where they tell foreigners 'we will tell golden dawn'. They give hitler credit and openly say they are uncompromising. And Jews have been leaving hungary and there have been attacks on roma people.
Our fallen ancestors would want action, we will remember them, we will remember them!
